lstModHist.Description: Backup Folder info resizes with main window resize.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Catches a Canopy Drive Full problem and reports appropriately.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Changes made to allow backup folders to be added more than once.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Time frame is now encoded as a prefix '[tf]-' to backed up filename .
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Fixed same named folder backups being marked with incorrect keep in period.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Internal changes making Canopy folders self contained objects.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Canopy now reads in an initial config file allowing distribution of admin or distribution defined configuration setup.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Window resizes changing backup folder path field with the window width.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: New field to set an expiry time to delete backups considered too old.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: tick box to keep last backup even if too old.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Changing the keep in period field requests a complete backup.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: fields to right of backup folder path only editable when the backup is inactive.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Fixed an error when no Canopy Folders defined.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis

lstModHist.Description: Fixed an error when 'Show All Messages' flag was not being loaded form the settings file.
lstModHist.Author: Andrew J. Davis
